p: FNAB, fine needle aspiration biopsy; US, ultrasound; IHC, immunohistochemistry; GATA3, GATA-binding protein 3; HER2, human epidermal growth factor receptor 2; ER, estrogen receptor; PR, progesterone receptor; TTF1, thyroid transcription factor; TG, Thyroglobulin; GCDFP15, gross cystic disease fluid protein 15; CT, computed tomography; PAX8, paired box 8; HE, hematoxylin and eosin.
